comments:
When I try to search the workspace when it contains files that are on networked drives I get a 
dialogue stating :

An error occurred during the search operation

Assertion failed; 
.

In the same workspace if I specify a working set that only contains local files then it will 
work fine for the same search.  Would like to get an idea of what is wrong with my setup or a workaround 
other than copying the remote files local.
